Installation¶

  1. The easiest way is to install using pip.

    $ python3 -m pip install git+https://github.com/anooplab/pymlgen.git

  2. You can get the source code

  • Clone the git repository if you have git installed.

    $git clone https://github.com/anooplab/pymlgen.git

  • You can download the zip file from https://github.com/anooplab/pymlgen.git

  1. Then from the pymlgen folder install:

$python setup.py install

If there is any problem, mail me: anoop@chem.iitkgp.ac.in
